Youssef Chaker

Born June 7th 1986

Computer Engineer by training, Software/Web App Developer by trade.

Favorite Programming Language: Ruby

Favorite Web Framework: Ruby on Rails

Platform of Choice: Mac OS X, Ubuntu (Linux flavor of the moment)

Editor of choice: TextMate, special install of gEdit with TextMate like bundles

Grew up in Beirut, Lebanon where I went to a French school. Moved to the U.S. for college in 2004. Graduated from UVA in may 2008 and have been in Charlottesville, VA. since. I speak Arabic, French and English fluently and understand the basics of Hindi and Urdu.

Some of my favorite quotes:

“Have mind, will travel”

“I am what I am”

“Say what you mean and mean what you say”

“Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding… It is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self. Therefore trust the physician, and drink his remedy in silence and tranquility…”
